experience.title: Director
experience.description: Bharat Re-Insurance Brokers Pvt. Ltd. is the largest Indian General Insurance and Re-Insurance Broking Company in India.As Director, my responsibilities include acquiring new corporate clients and following up service including presenting Bharat Re credentials, obtaining mandates, advise related to General Insurance and Re-Insurance.  I collaborate with key stakeholders for development and deployment of comprehensive risk control and safety programme. Engage in establishment and management of common workflow focused on efficient and effective use of technology. experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: I co-founded Suri Capital & Leasing Ltd. with my father; General A. L Suri, Ret, which brought out an IPO which was oversubscribed 3 times. At Suri Capital & Leasing Ltd, my responsibilities included providing financial consultancy to a number of corporate clients helping them with funding through banks and venture capital companies. I was engaged in building a practice from scratch, located emerging trends, and developed strong client relationships. I identified and closed investment mandates while serving as a primary strategic resource for clients. Suri Capital & Leasing Ltd was one of the only NBFCs in India to have obtained a debt free certificate from the Reserve Bank of India.
